Do higher experience level characters "ruin" scenarios?  What I mean 
is do higher experience level characters make scenarios less fun?

Along the way, I have another question: Do higher experience level 
characters "make" a scenario  or should a scenario be just as fun 
regardless of the experience level of the characters?
